website_summaries.verdict: A set of swim accessories that includes a silicone swim cap, goggles, nose clip, earplugs, and a case.
pros: The unique design of this swim cap features a pink flamingo so your child is easily identifiable in a crowded pool
Additionally, the swim cap is made from strong, highly elastic silicone for a better, more comfortable fit
cons: The included goggles may work themselves loose while your child is swimming

customer_reviews.title: Good Starter Goggles
customer_reviews.text: My 5yr old is on a competitive swim team and needed goggles for practice. These were great as they came with a silicone cap (which she needed as well). So far, with practice 3 days a week and using them for the past 3 months, they are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: DM Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great kids goggle set
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for my daughter for swim team. She loves the goggles, they fit her face perfectly. The swim cap makes it easy to see which lane she is in during her swim meets.
customer_reviews.author: Humphrie08

customer_reviews.title: Great first time swimming set
customer_reviews.text: The packagingof this item is very compact and cute. Everything was in alittle case which I love. My daughter used the goggles and swimming cap once and loved it very much. I'm happy with the purchasw
customer_reviews.author: Lena Fung

customer_reviews.title: Swimming hair cap w/goggles.
customer_reviews.text: This product is cute. It comes with goggles. Am noise piece. Ear pieces and the head cap. It keeps the kids hair dry and does not slip off. Only issue was the goggles kept coming loose from the straps. But I am still happy about the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Krystal B

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: The case that the material came in was really cool and of good quality. Overall all the pieces were very high quality and exactly how it was described.
customer_reviews.author: Baig

customer_reviews.title: Really cute set
customer_reviews.text: My oldest loves this set! She has very curly hair and we spend lots of time in our pool. The adorable flamingo design sold her on wearing this.
customer_reviews.author: hs2013

customer_reviews.title: Has made swimming even more fun!
customer_reviews.text: We loved this set. Perfect for our 4 year old and seems like it will grow with her. The cap is easy to slip on and it makes putting on the goggles a breeze. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Good for babies. My kid was 4 years old and didn’t fit
customer_reviews.author: jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Fit for all
customer_reviews.text: It's a good fit for kids and adults. The cap does slip off. The nose clips also slip off and if they're tight, they're not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.author: wanda vega

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Cap is easy to put on and works great for my daughter. It helps to keep goggles from sliding down.
customer_reviews.author: MKS

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This item is a great product and I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: great goggle, cap is too small
customer_reviews.text: The cap is too small....even for a child. We ended up returning product
customer_reviews.author: Jenny V.

customer_reviews.title: For short hair Only
customer_reviews.text: A great purchase but best for kids with short hair.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Fonseca

customer_reviews.title: Earplugs fall out
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 5 1/2 year old great. The ear plugs do not stay in the greatest but overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: The cap is really nice
customer_reviews.text: The goggles are uncomfortable the rubber inside mark my daughter skin
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Great cap small goggles
customer_reviews.text: The cap is great. The goggles are super small though.
customer_reviews.author: J DeMent

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Swim cap and googles are really cute but swim cap did not keep hair dry at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thirftyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 7 yr old perfectly. It truly is a great value. The price is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last all season and still going
customer_reviews.text: Great product for price. Worn every morning for practice and hasn’t ripped yet!
customer_reviews.author: Shaun A.

product_meta.title: DLY 5 in 1 Swimming Goggles + Swim Cap + Nose Clip + Ear Plugs + Case, Waterproof, No Leaking, Anti-Fog, Free Protection Case, Comfortable Fit for Youth Kids Child
feature_bullets: 【FULL SET COVERS ALL NEEDS】Amazing full set, with swim goggles, Swim cap, Nose Clip, Ear Plugs and Protective Case. Skin-friendly Material 100% PVC free. Latex free. Ensure an excellent swimming experience under water.

【PREMIUM SILICONE MATERIAL】kids Swimming cap is made from the latest advanced silicone which is tear resistance, better elasticity and can be stretched easily for optimum fit. And friendly to the skin.Our swim cap is shaped once according to the shape of a human skull. The 3D ergonomic design makes a more comfortable fit. It is easy and quick to take on and off .he swim cap can totally wrap your hair and prevent water.

【UNIQUE FlAMINGO DESIGN】 Our unicorn swim cap designs double as a safety feature! Now you can more easily spot your little swimmer while they’re playing in a crowded pool or ocean. It is the best Summer gift for children.

【HIGH QUALITY LENSES】The swimming goggles with special-designed Fully transparent Wide-angle lenses, you can enjoy a much better broader, clearer view. The eyes will not feel visual fatigue, even in low light conditions.

【DESIGNED FOR KID’S COMFORT】The Swimming Goggles for Kids are built from High-Quality odorless and hypoallergenic silicone.Easily adjustable straps could fit your kid's head perfectly.Flexible silicone frame and gasket can provide your kid's with maximum comfort as the gaskets have a unique cushioned design that creates a perfect seal around your eyes, ensuring no water in.
